---
title: "Get Transaction"
description: "Get details about a transaction"
---

You can request details about transactions in a few different ways:

- All - Returns all transactions
- Pending - Returns all pending transactions
- Processed - Returns all processed transactions
- By Id - Returns a specific transaction by id
- By Recpient Address - Returns all transactions for a specific recipient address

<RequestExample>
```bash API
# All Transactions 
curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/transaction"

# All Pending Transactions

curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/transaction?status=pending"

# All Processed Transactions

curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/transaction?status=processed"

# By Id

curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/transaction?id=<transaction_id>"

# By recipient address

curl -X GET "https://yournonciinstance.com/transaction?recipient=<recipient_address>"

````

```ts SDK
const allTxs = await nonci.getAllTxs()
const pendingTxs = await nonci.getPendingTxs()
const processedTxs = await nonci.getProcessedTxs()

const txById = await nonci.getTxById('<transaction_id>')
const txsByRecipient = await nonci.getTxsByRecipient('<recipient_address>')
````

</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>
```json All Transactions
{
    "message": "Fetched transactions",
    "transactions": [
        {
            "id": "64bc16bdd6f8cb44956a606a",
            "createdAt": "2023-07-22T17:49:49.580Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-07-22T17:49:49.580Z",
            "signedTx": "",
            "recipient": "8Dyk53RrtmN3MshQxxWdfTRco9sQJzUHSqkUg8chbe88",
            "isProcessed": false,
            "durableNonceId": "64ba9506331ae833f93225be",
            "signature": null
        },
        {
            "id": "64bc18c200a7e7f47f988ef3",
            "createdAt": "2023-07-22T17:58:26.313Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-07-22T17:58:27.095Z",
            "signedTx": "",
            "recipient": "6N57V6nyF6KEzyTPvL778mVTjtcg2Kn8Pq5dUqgUvFXE",
            "isProcessed": true,
            "durableNonceId": "64bc176fd6f8cb44956a606b",
            "signature": "3zapktzUffG76eEhgxT6K5JX7gyaUeR5sGGEvA5r7DsHnDfLSSnmmZF2dFfLkFp142qaBaMxZSQBho73ZZ8VotxM"
        },
    ]
}
